name: Lights Out (itch) (Turtle007)
description:
Your a robot named HelperBot3000, Your other bots have been turned against you, and you need to find out why. This game is for the Amaze Me Game Jam, but I might continue it.

Controls if needed:

A and D to move left and right

Space to Jump

W to switch the lights off or on again

R to return to menu, but don't spam it because the game will get slower (bug I'm trying to fix)

Hold Control and press F to go Full screen
